sources.title: New Town Original | Full Drama Movie | This Is Essex | Elliott Jordan
sources.description:
*New Town Original* - Mick spends a night with the girlfriend of the town's psycho. Now, he must choose: run or face the town's most feared man.
2005. Stars: Elliott Jordan, Katharine Peachey, Kal Aise, Terry Bird, John Campbell-Mac

metadata.Plot: I watched this film primarily because it's based in Basildon, Essex, which is an area I used to work in. I also felt that as an Essex resident myself I had to offer my support to the film. I did think that it would be a poorly put together film, due to the low budget and virtually unknown cast. However, I was very pleasantly surprised to find that I was gripped in the plot from beginning to end. The acting by most of the cast was extremely good and very believable. Essex mentality, nightlife, cultural and social scene was portrayed extremely well. I fell in love with the characters, warming to their worries and fears, and laughing at their mistakes and relationship blunders. The plot I felt was predictable and i had no reason to think otherwise until right near the end key parts of the plot were revealed. What I was seeing unfold in front of my eyes turned out to have other meanings. You have to watch it to understand what i mean. The twist and revelations at the end were fantastically thought out, giving the film a clever, steady and exciting pace.Excellent portrayal of a small town in England, and the lives of a group of young 20 something men struggling to find their way in life.I would recommend anyone see this film, especially Essex people or those that know the area. Not sure when its out on DVD but should be by the end of this year I would have thought.
metadata.Actors: Kal Aise, Terry Bird, John Campbell-Mac
